Read mutation burden data from sheet 'B-APM subtypes' in 1-s2.0-S0092867420301070-mmc7.xlsx.
Collect the idx values for the remaining 'Serous' tumour cases.
Subset the mutation-burden table to rows whose idx appears in that serous-case list.
Take the column Log2_variant_per_Mbp and convert it from log2 scale to linear scale with 2 ** value.
Compute the median of these converted variant-per-Mbp values.
